headline.main: You Don't Need Statistical Significance to Act on Smoking; Olfactory Pollution

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Full-page ads by a tobacco company purport to show that the health effects of secondhand tobacco smoke aren't so bad. The ads ignore the esthetic effects of drifting tobacco smoke. Many nonsmokers simply detest the smell of others' smoke.
